title: Diana Shipping Inc. Announces Time Charter Contract for M/V P. S. Palios with Glencore
description: ATHENS, Greece, Dec. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diana Shipping Inc. (NYSE: DSX), (the “Company”), a global shipping company specializing in the ownership and bareboat charter-in of dry bulk vessels, today announced that, through a separate wholly-owned subs…
